executable.title: Gyri Contour Segmentation
executable.description: Sparse-Field Levelset Sulci Segmentation. Given some initial points in polydata will construct a contour and evolve it to high mean-curvature areas, returning the interior region indices.\n Once the output surface has been loaded into Slicer, go to the Models module, Model Display pane, and set the Scalar Visibility Flag, select the LevelSetValue as the active scalar array, and pick the FreeSurfer RedGreen Scalar Color Map. The InitialCurvature and SmoothedCurvature may appear if the path finding failed.

parameters.label: Input Parameters
parameters.description: The inputs for the contour initialization and poly data

geometry.description: The filename of the input vtk XML polydata file for the surface.
geometry.label: Input Model

point.name: ContourSeedPts
point.label: Contour Points
point.description: The initialization points in x,y,z coords where the contour is seeded initially. Warning: there are topological restrictions, see the documentation.

geometry.name: OutputModel
geometry.description: Output model, in vtk xml poly data format.
geometry.label: Output Model

parameters.label: Filter Parameters
parameters.description: Set the number of iterations here
